title: Replace Moritz Care Home branding text with Maui Lane Care Home

requirements.summary: Replace all user-facing occurrences of the exact text "Moritz Care Home" with "Maui Lane Care Home" across the frontend UI (including print report header and reference capture page copy).
acceptanceCriteria: The print-only Resident Profile Report header shows "Maui Lane Care Home" instead of "Moritz Care Home" (frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/ResidentProfilePrintReport.tsx).
The references page no longer displays the string "Moritz Care Home" anywhere in its visible title/body text (frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzReferenceCapture.tsx).
A global search over frontend source text confirms there are no remaining user-facing occurrences of the exact string "Moritz Care Home".

file_operations.description: Update the print report header facility name text from "Moritz Care Home" to "Maui Lane Care Home" so printed output reflects the new branding.
Replace all user-facing occurrences of the exact string "Moritz Care Home" in the page title and body copy with "Maui Lane Care Home" while keeping the page structure and behavior unchanged.
